title: Goldilocks and the Three Bears
short_plot_summary: Goldilocks stumbles upon the house of the three bears and tries their porridge, chairs, and beds before being discovered by the bears.
explanation: A girl, representing Goldilocks, the main character of the story
A bear, symbolizing the three bears who own the house Goldilocks enters
A bowl of porridge, illustrating the different temperatures of porridge that Goldilocks tastes
A chair, representing the various sizes of chairs that Goldilocks tries
A bed, signifying the different levels of comfort Goldilocks finds in the bears' beds before being found by them
